page.text: "You have broken our laws traveller, and now..you must be punished." the warrior looks down at your expression and grins "your punishment is death inside my ass." she remarks, taking a position astride your form giving you a perfect look up her skirt at the bountiful curves her rear end. It'd be too tricky to escape her stomach if you wait until then, so now is your only chance..to wriggle back out her ass despite the difficulty.

choice.text: let the gut carry you along

Trying to wriggle back the way you came through the tight and clenching tube of her gut and bowel. despite her claim you can't appeal it seems you can at least get a stay of your sentence. Though probably now is the time to make tracks before she tries to apprehend you again.

Well you did break their laws. And it'd be you against the rest of the village and their hungry asses if you did escape. Maybe one should just submit to punishment. gameover.text: "mhmm, good assfood." the warrior remarks as she feels a thorough gurgle glorp through her belly indicating you're utterly digested now.
